metadata.description: Complete autonomous software engineering organization with 75 specialized agents, 19 autonomous workflows, 8 reusable skills, and revolutionary intelligence database system with persistent learning across all agents

plugins.name: orchestr8
plugins.description: Complete autonomous software engineering organization with 75 specialized agents, 19 autonomous workflows, 8 reusable skills, and revolutionary intelligence database system. Features persistent learning across all agents with SQLite database in .orchestr8/ - automatic initialization on plugin install, 25+ helper functions for workflow tracking, error learning, agent knowledge sharing, and quality gates. All 75 agents integrated with database access for cross-agent learning and pattern recognition. Reduces token usage by 80-90% through intelligent caching and context optimization. Self-extending plugin architecture with meta-orchestration, multi-stage code review, enterprise compliance, game development, AI/ML, blockchain/Web3, and comprehensive database support (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL Server, MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra, DynamoDB, Neo4j). Install once, work 8+ hours autonomously without context limits.
